Title : Deploy ontology service in the local machine
Owner : Eva Martin, Fuqi Xu
As a: data manager in the pharma
I want: to have internal ontology management services by reusing public open source services
So that: I can build a collection of preferred ontology sources and improve data security.
Role-Main: Data management, Data infrastructure
Role-Detail: Data steward, Data consumer
Stakeholder: service provider
Stakeholder-Focus: privacy and security, PID services, data annotation, data maintenance
